references.reason: This paper introduces a highly influential foundation model for image segmentation, which is directly adapted and applied in this paper for 3D part segmentation.
This paper presents a crucial vision-language model that enables zero-shot capabilities by aligning image and text data, a technique utilized in this work for semantic labeling of 3D parts.

references.paper_title: Emerging properties in self-supervised vision transformers
references.reason: This work is a foundational contribution to self-supervised learning for vision tasks, which this paper utilizes by distilling its knowledge to a 3D feature extraction backbone.

references.paper_title: Objaverse: A Universe of Annotated 3D Objects
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale dataset of 3D objects, which is used in this work for pre-training and scaling the proposed method to handle complex and diverse objects.

references.paper_title: Pointnet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This is a seminal work on deep learning for point cloud data, which provides the foundation for 3D feature extraction backbones used in this paper.
